heading: HCR0024
0: RESOLUTION PROVIDING THAT BOTH HOUSES OF CONGRESS CONVENE IN JOINT SESSION TO DELIBERATE ON THE REQUEST OF PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE TO FURTHER EXTEND THE PROCLAMATION OF MARTIAL LAW AND SUSPENSION OF THE PRIVILEGE OF THE WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS UNTIL 31 DECEMBER 2019 OR FOR SUCH OTHER PERIOD OF TIME AS THE CONGRESS MAY DETERMINE
status: Approved by the House on 0000-00-00, transmitted to the Senate on 2018-12-11 and received by the Senate on 2018-12-11
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HCR0024
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION PROVIDING THAT BOTH HOUSES OF CONGRESS CONVENE IN JOINT SESSION TO DELIBERATE ON THE REQUEST OF PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE TO FURTHER EXTEND THE PROCLAMATION OF MARTIAL LAW AND SUSPENSION OF THE PRIVILEGE OF THE WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS UNTIL 31 DECEMBER 2019 OR FOR SUCH OTHER PERIOD OF TIME AS THE CONGRESS MAY DETERMINE
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ANDAYA, ROLANDO JR. G.
DATE FILED : 2018-12-10
COUNTERPART HOUSE BILL/CONCURRENT RESOLUTION: SCR0015
REMARKS: Adopted by the House on Dec. 10, 2018, transmitted to the Senate on Dec. 11, 2018 and received by the Senate on Dec. 11, 2018
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2018-12-10
SECOND READING INFORMATION
RESOLUTION ADOPTED ON SECOND READING : 2018-12-10
ADOPTED RESOLUTION TITLE: CONCURRENT RESOLUTION PROVIDING THAT BOTH HOUSES OF CONGRESS CONVENE IN JOINT SESSION TO DELIBERATE ON THE REQUEST OF PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE TO FURTHER EXTEND THE PROCLAMATION OF MARTIAL LAW AND THE SUSPENSION OF THE PRIVILEGE OF THE WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS UNTIL 31 DECEMBER 2019 OR FOR SUCH OTHER PERIOD OF TIME AS THE CONGRESS MAY DETERMINE
CONCURRENT RESOLUTION NO. AS ADOPTED: CR00020
REMARKS : On Dec. 11, 2018, the Senate received the message of the House adopting HCR0024 on Dec. 10, 2018.
